bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Hannah Whitman Heyde, 23 March 1891
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: Am uneasy ab't you sister dear fear you are worse than usual. Nothing new or different with me—am getting along fairly considering—the doctor here yesterday—I like him—fine sunny afternoon—wrote & sent off a piece yesterday to N YNew York paper— Am sitting here as usual in big chair have a wood fire—roast apple for my supper—best love to you, Han dear—
